name: Chris O'Brien
title: Quality supplier, competive price
content: Good value for money - better quality mirror (thicker and taped) than competitors. Kept me progressed with order processing and the delivery person was very courteous and made sure ...

name: Shaid Shakoor
title: Quality supplier, competive price
content: Gareth was brilliant, he helped assist me in designing a half circle mirror with a cutout for one of our projects. Mirrorworld were patient with me in delaying the delivery for when I was ...

name: Barbara
title: Very pleased with the mirror
content: Very pleased with the mirror, it was much better quality than the mirror it was preplacing . Good price for custom made mirror and excellent service.
